website_summaries.verdict: The HP Photosmart A636 is an excellent at-home photo inkjet printer that's both versatile and easy to use. We highly recommend the A636 for its significant photo quality improvements over the last model and an attractive design to boot.

customer_reviews.title: Over a year in the closet and...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer for just over 100.00 to do on site printing. It paid for it self in no time. I put it in the closet and after almost 2 year2 I took it out I turn it on and with no hesitation it printed up 6 amazing prints just as it did way back when. I read something about the ink being too expensive I guess that would be the case for any printer, remember you are printing from home not having to get in your car and drive to a store. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good printer, annoying "features".
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing and returning a few HP Photo printers, this is the first model that actually worked. Be warned though, if you remove the print cartridge for any reason while it is still full, the printer electronically marks it as "used" and it will not print with that cartridge again. HP has decided that preventing customers from using refillable cartridges is more important than happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: Flyover Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and the ink lasts for a long
customer_reviews.text: Had an older version of HP photosmart and it finally died. Needed a new one and this one is very intuitive to use. Easy set up and the ink lasts for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stuff are missing
customer_reviews.text: My printer arrived without installation disk in a box,which has to be included,who took it ?Downloaded installation from HP website,can not make printer work with my Mac .Other then I cant use my computer to print pictures,pictures from the camera have good quality.Also non of the stores have 110 ink,have to order new cartridges from Amazon only.
customer_reviews.author: SVT

customer_reviews.title: how i like my printer which i sent back 1 month after having it
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say that this printer would not align or accept the photo paper. I had it for one month and they told me that it was not under warranty. I had a suckey experience with this printer. Never got to use it. Hoping i get a refund. HP people were not so willing to help. They blew me off. Sent it back after one and a half months that I had it. I did not even get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Rags

customer_reviews.title: printer
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this printer works because I didnt even plug it in. I was expecting a printer new in box and recieved a printer covered in a thick layer of dust and scratches. With the ink already installed and no padding in the box for shipping. Now Im fighting with the seller to get my money back. I would give this no stars if I could. I may not use amazon again after this headache.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Photo is jammed right after I used it. I can no longer use it to print.i have one of these printers already and it has worked fine for years.
customer_reviews.author: Goodiesugar

customer_reviews.title: HP Compact Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: A Little Pricey but I love this particular Style & Model. I bought one at Staples 4 years ago for much less. I'm grateful to have found it because the commercial stores no longer have them, don't know why? I love this little munchkin.
customer_reviews.author: xx SUGANO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: going to be taking it to a one year old birthday party next week
customer_reviews.author: Donna in Mississippi

customer_reviews.title: HP Compact Printer works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the printer I purchased. I like the older model of the compact printer because the screen size is larger and much easier to look at. I do think that the screen size is a significant consideration when purchasing a photo printer. The printer is somewhat slow, but is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tokyo Geo

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box and saw how cheaply this printer was constructed, I vowed I would still give it a chance. When I started printing out photos, though, I was completely bummed. Everything came out yellow, and no matter what I did, I could not adjust it. Also, it is terribly slow and noisy. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: LGreye

customer_reviews.title: No Problems!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable printer that has met all my expectations. Such a low price for a portable printer. I thought it was posted wrong, but two days later any worry was put to rest. Awesome super fast shipping and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: John Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The HP photo printer was indeed brand new and still in the original packing. I was very impressed with the operation, with the only glitch being that the contained trial ink cartridge was no longer functioning properly. As soon as a new cartridge was inserted, the product exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Illlinois based

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work upon receipt. Returned it for prompt credit from Amazon/Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: This product was described very well in several reviews. It is compact enough to travel well. Makes nice 5x7's. Has some fun features to edit photos & add borders. Delivery was about one week.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my HP Photosmart A636 Compact Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my HP Photosmart A636 Compact Photo Printer. Prints high quality pictures. Easy to use. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley L. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Greatly improved
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the similiar product bought more than 5 years ago. What an improvement. So much easier to use. I was very happy with the old one but it broke. The new one has many new featrues. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan A

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one myself to take to scrapbook crops. Loved it so much I ordered on for my mother in law so that she does not have to go to Walgreens, or CVS to get photos made.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Inman

customer_reviews.title: hp 636 printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer was nicely packaged and the instructions and other information brochures were numerous. The description of the printer was exactly what I expected to receive and I did.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Quick Photos
customer_reviews.text: On screen step by step instructions make this product so easy to use. Amazed with the features that this product offers. I don't think you will find it at a better price. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PICTURES!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little printer, it's compact and fun to use. The print quality is amazing!! I can do a lot of cool things to the photos. I absolutely LOVE this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Not for your everyday photo printing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer with lots of fun features, but the ink is far to expensive to use for your everyday printing needs. I estimate that the prints cost me about $1.20 per print. I can take my SD card to the corner drug store and have them printed for less than half that amount. If I had known the ink was so expensive, I never would have purchased this printer. Next time I will do my homework. If you just want to use this for special prints here and there, then buy it. If you are an avid printer like me... forget this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Eztz

customer_reviews.title: The printing speed  is slow however,  ptintouts are great.
customer_reviews.text: +The print cartridge that came with the printer was empty or dried out. Did not work, so I was disappointed with that. I think I should get a free cartridge. I do a lot of photography at different places & the people want a picture right away. Especially kids Christmas parties I photograph the kids & Santa & give them their photos right away.. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette cantwell

customer_reviews.title: stop working
customer_reviews.text: I used this printer off and on for 6 months all while wasting printer paper and ink learning how to use it. one day I turned it on and it wouldn't work. keeps telling me the aligning is off, Hp could not answer my questions and there was no help for me. this is ridiculous, HP can not even back their product up. its truly a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: TaylorJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good printer
customer_reviews.text: The printer is really nice in that it's a good, portable size and prints up to 5x7 pictures. The only downfall is that the pictures are printing darker than on the screen, so I haven't figured out if it's just a setting I'm not doing right or the printer itself! The original ink cartridge that came with it is still in there, and I have already printed 30 or more pictures so it isn't going as quickly as some have posted (thankfully!). Overall, you can't beat the price, portability, and capability this little printer offers! I'd recommend it for those who aren't constantly printing, but like to print occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Vitamin K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I Love my new Hp Printer! this is so perfect for any event easy quick print i add borders ,clip arts, and even brighten them up in just just seconds! i love HP printers for the great quality and their cheap inks. i would definitely consider buying this one i love mines especially for scrap booking. :)
customer_reviews.author: N. Lainez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Printer
customer_reviews.text: I've had this little guy for well over a year now, and I just keep using it more and more and it's great! I love the 5x7 size and photo printing is amazing. There is a really cool feature where you can print 2 or 4 photos per 5x7 page and that is great for my scrapbooking. I create really cute pages with a mix of sizes. It's really easy to use, but I wish I could figure out the cartridges. Sometimes, I get tons of photos, while others print off hardly any. Not sure why that is... but the printer itself is really amazing and I wouldn't trade it in for anything!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: HP Photoprinter
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes doesn't handle the paper very well. Requires some fiddling to get it to work. A disposable unit.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get a chance to enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Although I thought I brought a gem too, but I needed a e-print to be able to print from my Apple iPad or my cell phone without purchasing another printer. Didn't get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia j. webster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good photos
customer_reviews.text: I got this printer so that my kids could print photos for their scrapbooking projects. It was easy to use right out of the box and produces great photos. They have so much fun using the special features to edit the photos. The stylus included makes editing the photos (writing captions, decorations) very fun. I would definitely recommned this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S. Waybright

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money & time
customer_reviews.text: Never could get beyond the set up---won't calibrate. Eternal online help with hp, has resulted in me having this for months with all the given paper used up still trying to calibrate. Now that I see how much I'll spend in ink, I am hoping to unload this worthless item somewhere. BTW---should be a 0 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: CAR

customer_reviews.title: Prints beautiful color photographs - portable
customer_reviews.text: I love this Compact Photo Printer by HP. It prints beautiful clear color pictures. There are many things you can do with the picture editing. It's also wonderful to be able to take it with me to family gatherings. It allows me to print extra pictures for anyone that wants them. Great product! Diiiamond
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Wodzisz

customer_reviews.title: Breaks - But great quality photos
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 2 stars because when the printer works, it prints great quality photos, and did it in a very timely manner. Unfortunately, I am returning my third machine today. I am a photographer by trade, and have only used it for onsite holiday events. It is not a reliable machine. I am sad.
customer_reviews.author: ayee2

customer_reviews.title: Compact Photo Printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer. It works really well. Its super easy to find ink and photo paper for it as well. Its definitely cheaper to purchase the combo pack of ink and paper. You can even get it at Walmart. Definitely worth the money if you like to take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a one job printer
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this printer for the purpose of printing pictures from my camera or computer. It was verry easy to set up & get working & for that Im glade. The print quality is verry good, it does take a little longer for the picture to print but Im not in that big a hurry, the results are great.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard J. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Best Printer Out There and Best price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best Printer Out There and Best price on Amazon. Pictures are excellent! Get the paper in the combo pack, with both ink and paper, it will save you money.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: it takes out Pet eye and red eye u can put clip art, frames and etc. on pictures
customer_reviews.author: Karyn A. Culpepper

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Printer
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product! It does just what I was told it would do and since I got a rechargeable battery with it I can take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: C. Egbert

customer_reviews.title: HPA636 Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer worked great. We did have to buy the extended cartridge but the results at our fundraising party were great
customer_reviews.author: J. Steinberg

product_meta.title: HP Photosmart A636 Compact Photo Printer
feature_bullets: HP Auto Red-eye Removal, Photo brightness.
Photo print speed as fast as 27 sec (with border, direct connect)
